product_description: A layered, espadrille-style wedge revs up the sunny-day appeal of a comfort-minded sandal designed with a molded rubber sole and Easy Spirit's Evolve footbed.
product_details_and_care:
A layered, espadrille-style wedge revs up the sunny-day appeal of a comfort-minded sandal designed with a molded rubber sole and Easy Spirit's Evolve footbed. Evolve technology combines the brand’s Easy Support System with signature All-Encompassing Comfort (e360) system Anti-Gravity technology, creating an engineered footbed that offers enhanced energy return, responsive cushioning and lasting comfort without adding weight or bulk.
2 1/2" heel
Adjustable slingback strap with buckle closure
Cushioned footbed
Leather upper and lining/rubber sole
Imported
Women's Shoes
Item #5761413_2
